Package app.Models

Class SensorConfig

java.lang.Object
app.Models.SensorConfig
public class SensorConfig extends Object
Represents the configuration details for a sensor in a sensor network. This class encapsulates all necessary information needed to initialize and manage a sensor, including its connection to the network, graphical interface settings, and sensor-specific data.

  • Constructor Details

    • SensorConfig

      public SensorConfig(GraphicalNetworkInterface gui, String inboundPortRegister, String uriClock, Set<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.SensorDataI> sensors, int name, Position position)
      Constructs a SensorConfig with specific settings for a sensor.
      Parameters:
      gui - The graphical interface to be used with the sensor.
      inboundPortRegister - The inbound port identifier for registering this sensor.
      uriClock - The URI for the clock server used for time synchronization.
      sensors - The set of sensor data interfaces this sensor will handle.
      name - The numerical identifier for the sensor.
      position - The position of the sensor, encapsulated in a Position object.

  • Method Details

    • getGui

      public GraphicalNetworkInterface getGui()
      Retrieves the graphical interface associated with this sensor.
      Returns:
      The graphical interface for managing sensor visualization.

    • getInboundPortRegister

      public String getInboundPortRegister()
      Retrieves the inbound port used for registering the sensor.
      Returns:
      The inbound port identifier as a string.

    • getUriClock

      public String getUriClock()
      Retrieves the URI of the clock server associated with this sensor.
      Returns:
      The clock server URI as a string.

    • getSensors

      public Set<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.SensorDataI> getSensors()
      Retrieves the set of sensor data that this sensor will monitor.
      Returns:
      A set of SensorDataI, representing the data points the sensor handles.

    • getName

      public int getName()
      Retrieves the identifier of the sensor.

      Retrieves the position of the sensor.
